Take Back America

All patriots concerned about the state of our nation, the war, and the attacks on our Constitution, are invited to a very special pre-July 4th celebration on Central Square in Keene:

Thursday July 3rd, 6:15 pm - 7 pm.

Robert Bowman, Lt.Col. USAF, ret., who flew 101 Combat Missions as a Fighter Pilot in Vietnam, will give a brief speech titled Take Back America. Former Keene Mayor Michael E.J. Blastos will introduce the speaker.

The event is organized by the Monadnock 9/11 Truth Alliance and gained endorsements from Granny D (Doris Haddock), NH Representatives Barbara Richardson and Peter Allen, and local Vietnam War Veteran Jeffrey W. Scott.

Dr. Bowman is President of the Institute for Space and Security Studies, the recipient of the Eisenhower Medal, the George F. Kennan Peace Prize, the President's Medal of Veterans for Peace, the Republic Aviation Airpower Award, the Society of American Military Engineers' ROTC Medal of Merit (twice), the Air Medal with five oak leaf clusters, and the Meritorious Service Medal. Colonel Bowman directed the "Star Wars" programs under presidents Ford and Carter. His Ph.D. is in Aeronautics and Nuclear Engineering from Caltech. Professor Bowman taught at five colleges and universities, serving as Department Head and Assistant Dean. He has lectured at the National War College, the United Nations, Congressional Caucuses, the Academies of Science of six nations, and the House of Lords.

The event will also include a song commemorating 9/11 and street theater with Hilliare Wilder's large puppets.

At about 7 pm Dr. Bowman will continue with a more detailed presentation in the Auditorium of the Keene Public Library, just a block from Central Square. Admission is free.

Launch your Independence Day weekend with Dr. Bowman's hard-hitting thoughts on America's needs and on the true meaning of patriotism! Let's Take Back America!

Contact Persons: Gerhard Bedding, 355-2202 or Jim Smart 352-0438

Those unable to attend the July 3 event in Keene should take note that Dr. Bowman will also speak in Brattleboro on Sunday July 6th, 3 pm, at the Marlboro Tech Center in Brattleboro.

Friends,

We hope you can join us July 3rd!
Please help to give this event publicity
by forwarding it to your friends and e-mail lists
and posting it.

Whether you are able to join us or not, please
help us out with a donation to: Monadnock 9/11 Truth Alliance
and send to:
Monadnock 9/11 Truth Alliance , PO Box 1848, Keene, NH 03431.
Donations are not tax-deductible.

The total cost of this event is close to $ 700.
We cannot charge admission at the Square or at the Library
and therefore your financial support is essential.

Thank you!

Gerhard Bedding
